text:
The Blood Horns are the clan of the [[minotaur]] [[warlord]] [[Rhesh Turakbar]] of [[Droaam]], who raid and pillage in the name of the [[Horned King|Tol Kharash]]. They operate out of the fortress of [[Turakbar's Fist]].

The Blood Horns are among the most brutal and belligerent [[minotaur]] clans. Many of
the victims of Turakbar raids are brutally sacrificed
to slake the blood thirst of the [[overlord]] of [[minotaur]]s.
[[Rhesh|Rhesh Turakbar]] and his clan are said to wield [[demon]]ic
power bestowed by their dark lord. They believe the [[Horned King|Tol Kharash]]'s favored servants are the [[goristro]]s, and file their teeth to jagged points to better resemble them.
title: Blood Horns
